name: Dollar / Booley Bays
description: Dollar / Booley Bays S750-055 Sheet 76 Actually both beaches are one beach at LW. The passing of Broomhill Point S744-049 is a pleasure. The cliffs to southward are high and cut with fissures worthy of the west coast. This is probably the most impressive part of the entire round of the Hook. There is limited parking at either beach. Dollar is a bit the easier. Both are beautiful. There can be excellent and very regular mid-sized surf waves when conditions are right â€“ Southerly F6 or above in preceeding days, according to locals.
